Index.intro2: Is it too late to start?
Index.intro3: - Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, existing technologies are helping many businesses save 70% of human resources and operating costs!
Index.intro4: - However, they will be useless if your business is still using manual paperwork and Excel with non-standardized processes and data.
Index.intro5: *Question? Change to develop or accept falling behind?
Index.value2: Like every other business, DTak itself is building its own suitable flywheel and working day and night to push that flywheel round and round to create an objective cycle in a day not far.
Index.process2: Being careful in each step of development is the most important factor to help the product meet customer requirements with the best quality.
Index.service2: With a dynamic and enthusiastic staff, DTak constantly introduces new products, services and features to meet the constant changes in technology in the field of supporting business digital transformation.
Index.service4: DTak undertakes the design and development of Mobile apps, builds corporate websites, e-commerce, builds technology infrastructure, and data security. Businesses just need to give you a problem, DTak will help you complete it.
Index.service6: Convert from a manual operating model, paper documents, Excel to a standardized set of processes with 100% digitized data that is easy to analyze, report, search and optimize for the application of AI tools after.
Index.service8: Instead of having to invest and maintain a costly IT team, hiring IT experts and engineers from DTak will help your business not only save but also bring much higher efficiency.
Index.service10: Sales management software system for F&B models: Restaurant, Cafe, Retail, Wholesale, Supermarket, Fashion, Karaoke, Laundry, Spa, etc.
